title: ADC LF Team!!
body:
Hey,
ADC Main is looking for a Team to Flex and Play Tournaments. Just wishing to learn, progress and having a nice time.

What I can offer you :
- willingness to learn and study different ways of playing heroes
- Ability to take criticism
- Discord / Teamspeak
- ability to stand losing :D
- experience in my role
- got a wide Champion Pool
- A strong will to win and improve


Add me ingame for further details:
Nirolex

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} 


Link to OP.GG: http://euw.op.gg/summoner/userName=Nirolex
